heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T sees a fortune teller in attempts to figure out how to most efficiently occupy his time with the most important things to do.
Ru_trainchinese:
zhàn: (глаг) составлять, обладать (напр., преимуществом)
zhàn: (глаг) захватывать, занимать силой; занимать (время или место)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T sees a fortune teller in attempts to figure out how to most efficiently occupy his time with the most important things to do.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " person " and " account ", modern Chinese means occupation. "Lao Can Travels" Chapter 9: "(The bamboo shoot) was taken by Teng Liugong."

" Account " can mean whispering. "Historical Records: The Biography of the Xiongnu": "The people in the Tushi, Gu has no words, and chatter and occupy it. Why should the crown be solid?" Sima Zhen's "Suoyin" quoted Deng Zhan as saying: "Zhan, whisper."

" Account " can also be used as " Zang " to mean prying. "Jiyun‧Salt Rhyme": "Zang, look at it, or do it." "Book of Rites·Xueji": "The teacher of today, shove it to complete it." Zheng Xuan's note: "Account, look at it."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and " account ", modern Chinese means occupation.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「占」聲，近現代漢語表示佔據。《老殘遊記》第9回：「（笋）被騰六公佔去了。」

　　「佔」可表示低聲細語。《史記‧匈奴列傳》：「嗟土室之人，顧無多辭，另喋喋而佔佔，冠固何當？」司馬貞《索隱》引鄧展曰：「佔，囁耳語。」

　　「佔」還可通「覘」，表示窺視。《集韻‧鹽韻》：「覘，闚也，或作佔。」《禮記‧學記》：「今之教者，呻其佔畢。」鄭玄注：「佔，視也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「占」聲，近現代漢語表示佔據。

從「 人 」，「 占 」聲，近現代漢語表示佔據。《老殘遊記》第9回：「（笋）被騰六公佔去了。」 「 佔 」可表示低聲細語。《史記‧匈奴列傳》：「嗟土室之人，顧無多辭，另喋喋而佔佔，冠固何當？」司馬貞《索隱》引鄧展曰：「佔，囁耳語。」 「 佔 」還可通「 覘 」，表示窺視。《集韻‧鹽韻》：「覘，闚也，或作佔。」《禮記‧學記》：「今之教者，呻其佔畢。」鄭玄注：「佔，視也。」
From the sound of " person" and " account", modern Chinese means occupation. "Lao Can Travels" Chapter 9: "(The bamboo shoot) was taken by Teng Liugong." " Account" can mean whispering. "Historical Records: The Biography of the Xiongnu": "The people in the Tushi, Gu has no words, and chatter and occupy it. Why should the crown be solid?" Sima Zhen's "Suoyin" quoted Deng Zhan as saying: "Zhan, whisper." " Account" can also be used as " Zang" to mean prying. "Jiyun‧Salt Rhyme": "Zang, look at it, or do it." "Book of Rites·Xueji": "The teacher of today, shove it to complete it." Zheng Xuan's note: "Account, look at it."

佔字的基本解释

佔
zhàn
同“占2”①②。

佔
diān
〔佔侸〕ａ．轻薄；ｂ．下垂；ｃ．疲惫。

佔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàn］
［《集韻》陟陷切，去陷，知。］
据有；占据。
[②]［chān］
［《集韻》處占切，平鹽，昌。］
见“佔2佔”。
[③]［chān］
［《集韻》癡廉切，平鹽，徹。］
见“佔3畢”。
[④]［diān］
［《廣韻》丁廉切，平添，端。］
见“佔4侸”

佔字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佔； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页98第14
【廣韻】【集韻】?丁兼切，音?。字書云：佔侸，輕薄也。　又【集韻】【正韻】?與覘同。【禮·學記】今之敎者，呻其佔畢。【註】佔，視也。畢，?也。但吟諷所佔視之?牘，不能通其蘊奧也。呻，吟諷之聲也。與覘音義同。　又佔佔同沾沾。【前漢·匈奴傳】令喋喋而佔佔。【索隱曰】佔囁，耳語。

考證：〔【禮·樂記】今之敎者，呻其佔畢。〕　謹照原書樂記改學記。

Same as Zang. 【Ritual·Learning Records】Today’s sacred person, quack it will be completed. 【Note】Account, see also. Bi, also. But the slogan that satirizes and regards can't understand its enigma.
